response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the requested output:

Preparing Legal Documents and Maintaining Filing Systems

1. Draft affidavits and other legal documents • Obtain necessary information from clients, attorneys, or case files • Prepare initial drafts of affidavits, legal correspondence, motions, briefs, contracts, and other documents • Proofread and edit documents for accuracy, clarity, and proper formatting • Finalize documents and obtain signatures when required 2. Organize and maintain documents in filing systems • Create logical filing structures for both paper and electronic documents • Consistently name and categorize files for easy search and retrieval • Regularly back up electronic files and create paper copies of key documents • Purge outdated or irrelevant documents in accordance with document retention policies • Ensure filing systems adhere to confidentiality and data security protocols
response.extracted:
Preparing Legal Documents and Maintaining Filing Systems

1. Draft affidavits and other legal documents • Obtain necessary information from clients, attorneys, or case files • Prepare initial drafts of affidavits, legal correspondence, motions, briefs, contracts, and other documents • Proofread and edit documents for accuracy, clarity, and proper formatting • Finalize documents and obtain signatures when required 2. Organize and maintain documents in filing systems • Create logical filing structures for both paper and electronic documents • Consistently name and categorize files for easy search and retrieval • Regularly back up electronic files and create paper copies of key documents • Purge outdated or irrelevant documents in accordance with document retention policies • Ensure filing systems adhere to confidentiality and data security protocols
